Package a2

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • a2.FileManager
  • public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object

    Class to Manage Saving or Loading File or ArrayList Formats

    This class provides methods to iterate through either a file or ArrayList of shapes to draw and return these formatted into the relevant variable type.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Melanie Howard

      FileManager()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList> loadFile​(java.io.File file)
      This method takes a file in VEC format and iterates through it, returning ArrayList of instances off Shapes with co-ordinates and pen and fill colours in RGB format, which can be used by CanvasPanel to draw these shapes.
      java.lang.String saveFile​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList> listOfShapes)
      This method takes an ArrayList of shapes drawn on the CanvasPanel and iterates through returning a string of each command and it's VEC co-ordinates followed by a unix LF line break.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • saveFile

        public java.lang.String saveFile​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList> listOfShapes)
        This method takes an ArrayList of shapes drawn on the CanvasPanel and iterates through returning a string of each command and it's VEC co-ordinates followed by a unix LF line break. The string will then be written into a .VEC file.
        Parameters:
        listOfShapes - this is the ArrayList of shapes used to draw in CanvasPanel.
        Returns:
        String of commands in VEC format.

      • loadFile

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList> loadFile​(java.io.File file)
        This method takes a file in VEC format and iterates through it, returning ArrayList of instances off Shapes with co-ordinates and pen and fill colours in RGB format, which can be used by CanvasPanel to draw these shapes.
        Parameters:
        file - this a file .VEC chosen with a fileChooser.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Shapes in the requisite format to be drawn in CanvasPanel.
